sentences.en: A couple more men had elevated themselves on a chest of drawers.
sentences.cn: 别外有两个男人,高踞在五屉柜上.

sentences.en: Classic Greek drama was written in verse, usually in an elevated and formal style.
sentences.cn: 古典希腊戏剧以韵文写成，通常用词讲究、结构整齐。

sentences.en: His career has blossomed and that has given him a certain elevated status.
sentences.cn: 他的事业蓬勃发展，这在一定程度上提升了他的地位。

sentences.en: Jack elevated the gun at the sky.
Materials are elevated to the top floor by the new hoist.
sentences.cn: 材料由那台新起重机吊到楼顶.

sentences.en: On the receiving instrument he also used an elevated aerial and earth.
sentences.cn: 在接收装置上,他也采用了高架天线和接地装置.

sentences.en: Suddenly, the narrator speaks in his most rhetorically elevated mode.
sentences.cn: 突然，解说员开始用高昂煽情的语调解说起来。

sentences.en: The clerk was elevated to a managerial position.
sentences.cn: 那个职员被提升到经理职位.

sentences.en: The good news elevated everyone's spirits.
sentences.cn: 这个好消息鼓舞了每个人的情绪.

sentences.en: The house is in an elevated position, overlooking the town.
sentences.cn: 这栋房子地势较高，可以俯瞰全城。

sentences.en: The orbital periosteum is elevated from medial wall of the orbir.
sentences.cn: 眼眶骨膜从眼眶内侧壁剥离.

sentences.en: The platform was elevated to a height of five feet.
sentences.cn: 平台被升到五英尺的高度.

sentences.en: The President elevated him to the House of Lords.
sentences.cn: 总统提拔他为上院议员.

sentences.en: When pulmonary capillary pressure is markedly elevated, pulmonary edema ensues.
sentences.cn: 当肺毛细血管压力明显升高时, 就出现肺水肿.

words.tran_cn: 高地；海拔；提高；崇高；正面图
电梯；升降机；升降舵；起卸机
提升；举起；振奋情绪等；提升…的职位
提高；抬起；振奋；提拔（elevate的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 高温；升高温度，提高温度

trans.tran_en: elevated thoughts, words etc seem to be intelligent or of high moral standard

trans.tran_cn: 举起( elevate的过去式和过去分词 )，提高，提升，鼓舞
